name: Air Wings Intergalactic
description:
• Online multiplayer battles!
• Supports Game Controllers!
• Supports AirPlay!

Air Wings Intergalactic is a multiplayer game where you pilot various spacecraft, and battle against other online players from around the world. It is simply the best multiplayer game for iOS! The action and excitement is incredible!

There are 7 different ships to choose from, and 13 different levels to battle in. There are 6 different types of weapons that your ships can fire ranging from heat seeking missiles, to laser beams, to magnetic mines.
